law.catch_line: Treasurer head of department -- Where to keep office.
law.text: The Department of the Treasury shall be headed by the State Treasurer. He shall reside and keep his office at the seat of government.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4618-77, 4684.
